Wishlist

  • Home
  • Whislist
Our Wishlist

Give Us Now

Dele Ajayi Foundation is a charitable organisation that has needs as we serve people across the globe. We maintain a wish list of items from notebooks to toiletries. Any items that are donated is one that we do not need to purchase. Each donation supports our mission to support the needy.

Scholarships

We are here to support the school students by providing tuition support to make the education journey easy and achievable.

Donate
Details

School Supplies

Over the years, DAF has provided school supplies to students to ease the burden on the parents and guardians. We are a platform to your needs.

Donate
Details

Food Supplies

We have dealt with hunger in many communities in the USA and West Africa by distributing foods to Churches, Mosques and individuals in need.

Donate
Details

Housing Support Services

DAF supported the needy in paying rents to provide shelter to them and their loved ones.

Donate
Details

Get Help

DAF is one channel to get help.

Donate
Details
Help Us

Your Donation Can Change Someone’s Life

Nothing is too small when it comes to touching people’s lives, your donations will make someone smile and help the needy. Let’s make the change together.

US Location
  • PO BOX 1475 Tomball, TX 77375
  • +1346-495-6376

West Africa-Nigeria Location
